name: Environmental protection technology
description: Within Engineering and engineering trades, this field is the study of processes designed to minimize discharge and waste, avoid pollution, and control impacts on water, air, and soil.

name: Air pollution control
description: Technologies and strategies aimed at reducing or eliminating the emission of pollutants into the atmosphere.

name: Ecological technology
description: The application of ecological principles to the design and management of sustainable technologies and systems.

name: Energy efficiency
description: The study and application of methods to reduce energy consumption while maintaining or improving output, a key aspect of environmental protection technology.

name: Environmental engineering
description: The branch of engineering concerned with protecting people from adverse environmental effects and improving environmental quality.

name: Industrial discharge control
description: Technologies and methods for managing and treating waste discharged from industrial processes to minimize environmental impact.

name: Noise pollution control
description: Techniques and strategies for reducing unwanted or disturbing sound levels in the environment.

name: Recycling
description: The process of converting waste materials into new materials and objects, a core component of environmental protection technology.

name: Water pollution control
description: Technologies and strategies aimed at reducing or eliminating the contamination of water bodies.
